law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Rifle" has the meaning stated in § 4-201 of the Criminal Law Article.
"Short-barreled rifle" has the meaning stated in § 4-201 of the Criminal Law Article.
"Short-barreled shotgun" has the meaning stated in § 4-201 of the Criminal Law Article.
"Shotgun" has the meaning stated in § 4-201 of the Criminal Law Article.
